text:
Measurements.jl is essentially an operator
Overloading  AD library

elements.text:
Measurements.jl is essentially an operator
Overloading  AD library

text:
I bet we can make some general statement about pairs of objects, and matching pairs of functions where the later always a linear operator,
is always going to be in some sense isomorphic to operator overloading forwards mode AD.
Because of properties of vector spaces.

Possibly we need something a bit more tight that relates things to order 2 polynomials.
:zzz:
